mapper.select: SELECT classify FROM movie GROUP BY classify

SELECT CAST(u.userAge as char) AS userAge,CAST(r.recordCount AS char) AS recordCount,CAST(p.playCount AS char) AS playCount,CAST(f.favoriteCount AS char) AS favoriteCount FROM ( (SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,a.create_date,now()) as userAge from user a where user_id=#{userId}) u, (SELECT count(*) as recordCount FROM record_movie WHERE user_id = #{userId} )r, (SELECT count(*) as playCount FROM record_movie WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_play = 'Y') p, (SELECT count(*) as favoriteCount FROM favorite_movie WHERE user_id =#{userId} ) f)
